actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to prohibit the receipt of honoraria by Members, officers, or employees of the Senate on or after the first day that there takes effect any increase in the salaries of Members, officers, or employees of the Senate as recommended by the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial salaries and included in the budget transmitted by the President to the Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits Senate Members, officers, or employees from accepting honoraria on or after the first day that the recommendations of the President relating to pay rates for executive, legislative, or judicial branches takes effect. Allows donations on behalf of Members, officers, or employees to charitable organizations. Prohibits a pension or annuity benefit from accruing to a Member, officer, or employee based on such donations. Directs the Select Committee on Ethics to prescribe regulations specifying which expenses are to be included as actual and necessary travel expenses. Prohibits a donation to a charitable organization, or other entity, made at the request of or on behalf of a Member, officer, or employee from being converted to the personal use of such Member, officer, or employee either during or following their terms of service.

titles.title: A resolution to prohibit the receipt of honoraria by Members, officers, or employees of the Senate on or after the first day that there takes effect any increase in the salaries of Members, officers, or employees of the Senate as recommended by the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial salaries and included in the budget transmitted by the President to the Congress.
